albedo = 0.1	albedo = 0.2	albedo = 0.3	albedo = 0.4	albedo = 0.5	albedo = 0.6	albedo = 0.7	albedo = 0.8	albedo = 0.9	albedo = 1.0


!Values of the H-function for different values of mu and albedo.
!mu = cos(theta), theta being the incident/emergent angle, and 'albedo' is the single-scattering albedo

!mu starts at 0 and increases in 0.05 divisions until it reaches 1.
